pkgmetadata.longdescription: CUDD stands for Colorado University Decision Diagram. It is a package for the manipulation of Binary Decision Diagrams (BDDs), Algebraic Decision Diagrams (ADDs) and Zero-suppressed Binary Decision Diagrams (ZDDs).
CUDD 是科罗拉多大学决策图软件包的缩写。它是一个用于操作二元决策图 (BDD)、 代数决策图 (ADD) 和零抑制二元决策图 (ZDD) 的软件包。
